statements: INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, country, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Carbonara', 'Italy', 'Spaghetti, bacon, eggs, Parmesan cheese, black pepper', '1. Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. 2. Fry bacon until crispy. 3. Beat eggs and Parmesan cheese in a bowl. 4. Mix hot spaghetti with bacon and egg mixture. 5. Season with black pepper.')

INSERT INTO recipes (dish_name, country, ingredients, instructions, recipe_id) VALUES ('Chicken Tikka Masala', 'India', 'Chicken, yogurt, tomato sauce, spices, cream', '1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. 2. Grill chicken until cooked. 3. Simmer in tomato sauce and cream. 4. Serve hot with rice or naan.', 2)

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, country, dish_name, instructions, ingredients) VALUES (3, 'Mexico', 'Tacos', '1. Prepare filling with seasoned meat, beans, and toppings. 2. Fill taco shells with the mixture. 3. Enjoy with salsa and guacamole.', 'Ground beef, beans, lettuce, cheese, tomatoes, salsa, guacamole, taco shells')

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, ingredients, country, instructions) VALUES (4, 'Sushi Rolls', 'Sushi rice, nori, seafood, vegetables', 'Japan', '1. Prepare sushi rice and fillings. 2. Spread rice on nori sheet. 3. Add fillings and roll tightly. 4. Slice and serve with soy sauce and wasabi.')

INSERT INTO recipes (dish_name, country, instructions, ingredients, recipe_id) VALUES ('Caesar Salad', 'United States', '1. Prepare lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese. 2. Toss with Caesar dressing. 3. Serve as a side dish or main course.', 'Romaine lettuce, croutons, Parmesan cheese, Caesar dressing', 5)

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, country, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (1, 'Spaghetti Carbonara', 'Italy', 'Spaghetti, Eggs, Pancetta, Parmesan Cheese', '1. Cook spaghetti
2. Fry pancetta
3. Mix eggs with cheese
4. Combine all ingredients')

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, country, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (2, 'Tacos al Pastor', 'Mexico', 'Pork, Pineapple, Cilantro, Onion, Corn Tortillas', '1. Marinate pork
2. Grill meat and pineapple
3. Assemble tacos with toppings')

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, country, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (3, 'Chicken Tikka Masala', 'India', 'Chicken, Yogurt, Tomatoes, Garam Masala, Cream', '1. Marinate chicken in yogurt
2. Grill chicken
3. Cook sauce with spices
4. Mix cooked chicken with sauce')

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, country, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (4, 'Sushi Rolls', 'Japan', 'Sushi Rice, Nori, Fish, Vegetables, Soy Sauce, Wasabi', '1. Prepare sushi rice
2. Slice fish and vegetables
3. Roll sushi with nori
4. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi')

INSERT INTO recipes (recipe_id, dish_name, country, ingredients, instructions) VALUES (5, 'Pad Thai', 'Thailand', 'Rice Noodles, Shrimp, Tofu, Bean Sprouts, Peanuts, Tamarind Sauce', '1. Stir-fry shrimp and tofu
2. Cook noodles and bean sprouts
3. Mix with tamarind sauce and peanuts')
